title: 2.2 Master Challenge 1
question: Write a program to assign a user input number to a variable num. Use the if-elif- else statements to show the corresponding day of the week, for example, 1 for Sunday, 2 for Monday, and so on. If the number assigned does not fall between 1 to 7, show a message displaying Invalid input.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
